TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class PrincipalCollection Implements ICollection, ICollection(Of Principal), IEnumerable(Of Principal)
type PrincipalCollection = class interface ICollection<Principal> interface seq<Principal> interface IEnumerable interface ICollection

Docs.summary: A mutable collection of objects derived from the class. This class is designed to be used for multi-valued properties that contain Principals. Manipulating the contents of this collection changes the contents of the corresponding store property, which is made permanent when is called on the corresponding principal object.
Adds the specified principal to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Remove%2A>和<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Contains%2A>，有四個多載，此函式，但它們全都執行相同的動作。 額外的多載只實作可以改善可用性，以便開發人員使用 Intellisense，請參閱 「 多載接受<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>， <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal>，或<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>物件。 呼叫其中一個使用者、 群組或電腦的多載就完全相當於呼叫<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>多載。

public: void Add(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalContext ^ context, System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::IdentityType identityType, System::String ^ identityValue);

Docs.param: The object for the principal to be added to the collection.
An object that specifies the format of identityValue
A string that identifies the principal, in the format specified by identityType
Docs.summary: Searches for a object that matches the parameters, and adds it to the end of the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此函式可以擲回下列例外狀況：
|例外|描述| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>|主體符合這些參數已存在於集合中。| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>|找不到符合指定的參數沒有主體。| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>|多個主體符合所指定的參數。| |<xref:System.ArgumentException>|`identityType` 為空字串|

Docs.summary: Removes all Principals from the collection.

remarks.format:

|例外|描述| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>|如果在呼叫此方法<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>PrincipalCollection，<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>無法清除屬性，因為一或多個群組的成員擁有此群組為其主要群組|

Docs.summary: Returns true if the specified Principal is a member of the PrincipalCollection, false otherwise. The Principal can be specified in the same manner as in the .methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal[] array, int index);

Public Sub CopyTo (array As Principal(), index As Integer)
public: virtual void CopyTo(cli::array <System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^> ^ array, int index);
abstract member CopyTo : System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal[] * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal[] * int -> unit

Docs.param: The that should be populated with objects.
The position in array into which the first principal object in the collection should be copied.
Docs.summary: Copies the objects from this into the specified array, starting at the specified position index in array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須是一維陣列。 如果未列出，請<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。 進一步的例外狀況擲回，如果要複製的項目數大於從可用的空間`index`到結尾`array`，如果`array`是`null`，或如果`index`小於 0。

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator to iterate through the principals in the .
Docs.returns: An containing the principals in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就概念而言，每個執行個體<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection>具有與其相關聯的單一列舉。 雖然多次呼叫<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A>傳回相異<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>物件，它們會共用相同的內部狀態。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns false. It is up to the application to serialize access to this collection.
Removes the specified principal from the collection, and returns if the specified principal object was a member of the collection, and otherwise (in which case no operation is performed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add%2A>，和<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Contains%2A>有四個多載，此函式，但它們全都執行相同的動作。 額外的多載只實作可以改善可用性，以便開發人員使用 Intellisense，請參閱 「 多載接受<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>， <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal>，或<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>物件。 呼叫其中一個使用者、 群組或電腦的多載就完全相當於呼叫<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>多載。

public: bool Remove(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalContext ^ context, System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::IdentityType identityType, System::String ^ identityValue);

Docs.param: An that identifies the format of identityValue.
Docs.summary: Finds the object specified by the given and / pair from the collection, and returns if the identified was a member of this , and otherwise (in which case the method performs no operation).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此函式可以擲回下列例外狀況：
|例外|描述| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>|在呼叫這個方法<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>集合的網域群組，以及要移除該網域主體是憑藉的群組成員其`primaryGroupId`屬性。| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>|找不到符合指定的參數沒有主體。| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>|多個主體符合所指定的參數。 理論上來說，這應該永遠不會發生，因為<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add%2A>嘗試將重複的主體加入至集合時，會擲回例外狀況。 不過，就可以另一個 API，建立重複項目。| |<xref:System.ArgumentException>|`identityType` 為空字串。|
